Title: Great Pictures.  Nice camera.
Cons: Uses not so common cable for USB interface and charging.  But you can find the cables ok.
Pros: Good size.  Good quality.  Good pictures.  Battery life ok.  Nice interface.
Comments:
After using Canon P/S for decade plus, I switched to Olympus.  Glad I did.  Love this little camera.  Images clean at higher ISO's.  You can use auto iso for quick pics without fear.  Good interface on screen.  Decent feature set.
Get yourself spare batteries, cable, and a charger, and your all set.
